title: Ready to work view
description: View showing issues with no open blockers (bd ready). This is beads' killer feature - surface it prominently.

title: Project setup: React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind
Keyboard navigation (j/k, arrows, Enter, Esc)
description: Full keyboard support: j/k or arrows to move, Enter to open detail, Esc to close, / to search.

title: Comments view and add
description: View comments on issues and add new comments with author attribution.

title: Close and reopen issues
description: Buttons/actions to close and reopen issues.

title: Inline editing of issue fields
description: Click to edit title, description, and other fields directly in the list or detail view.

title: Cycle detection warnings
description: Warn when dependency cycles exist. Link to bd dep cycles output.

title: Multi-label filter selection
description: Label filter only allows single selection, but issues can have multiple labels. Allow selecting multiple labels with AND/OR mode toggle.

title: Blocked issues view
description: View showing issues that are blocked by other issues. Show what's blocking them.

title: Saved filter views
description: Save filter/sort combinations as named views. Quick switch between views.

title: Label filtering
description: Filter issues by label. Support both AND (all labels) and OR (any label) filtering modes.

title: Status filter (open, in_progress, blocked, closed)
description: Quick filter buttons or dropdown to filter by issue status.

title: Copy issue ID to clipboard
description: Click to copy issue ID for easy reference in commits or messages.

title: Persistent filter state in URL
description: Encode filter/sort state in URL for bookmarking and sharing views.

title: Loading states and error handling
description: Show loading spinners while fetching data. Display friendly error messages.

title: Type filter (bug, feature, task, epic, chore)
description: Filter issues by type with visual type icons.

title: Priority filter and visual indicators
description: Filter by priority level. Show priority with color coding (P0=red, P1=orange, etc).

title: Bulk actions (close, label, delete multiple)
description: Select multiple issues and perform bulk operations.

title: Text search across title and description
description: Real-time search box that filters issues by title and description content.

title: Responsive design for mobile
description: UI works well on mobile devices and tablets.

title: Dependencies visualization
description: Show what blocks/is blocked by each issue. Visual dependency links.

title: Create new issue form
description: Modal or panel to create new issues with all fields: title, description, type, priority, labels.

title: Smart date formatting with relative times
description: Dates show no time granularity. Use relative times for recent (5 min ago, 2h ago), short format for today (10:42 AM), date for this week (Mon 10:42), full date for older. Show full timestamp on hover.

title: Show project name in page title and header
description: The browser tab and page header should clearly show which beads project is being viewed (e.g., 'beads-better-ui - Beads UI'). This helps when working with multiple projects.

title: Sort by date: created, updated, closed
description: Add sorting options for all date fields. Users should be able to sort ascending/descending by created_at, updated_at, and closed_at dates.

title: Dependency graph visualization (interactive)
description: Visual graph showing issue dependencies. Interactive - click to navigate. Show blocks/blocked-by relationships. Use d3.js or similar for layout.

title: Kanban board view
description: Drag-and-drop kanban board with columns: Blocked, Ready, In Progress, Closed. Cards show key info at a glance.

title: Label management (add/remove labels)
description: Add and remove labels on issues. Autocomplete from existing labels.

title: Issues list view with sortable columns
Estimates display and editing
description: Show and edit time estimates on issues. Display in detail view and optionally in list.

title: Delete issues with confirmation
description: Delete issues with a confirmation dialog to prevent accidents.

title: External refs display (GitHub, Jira)
description: Show external references as clickable links. Support GitHub issues/PRs and Jira tickets.

title: Stale issues indicator
description: Highlight issues that haven't been updated recently. Configurable threshold.

title: Assignee filter
description: Filter issues by assignee. Show unassigned issues.

title: Epics view with progress tracking
description: Show epics with child issue counts and completion percentage.

title: Issue detail panel/modal
description: Click on issue to open detail view. Show all fields: title, description, status, priority, type, labels, dependencies, comments, created/updated/closed dates.

title: WebSocket server to communicate with bd CLI
Labels visible in list view
description: Display labels as colored badges in the issues list. Each issue row should show all its labels.

title: Pinned issues
description: Show pinned issues at top of list. Allow pinning/unpinning from UI.

title: Dark mode support
description: Toggle between light and dark themes. Respect system preference.

title: Real-time updates via WebSocket
description: Live updates when issues change. No need to refresh.

title: Critical path highlighting
description: Highlight the critical path through the dependency graph - the longest chain that determines project completion.
